title: Graded HOFers available - Wajo Matty Young - last chance
author: bounce

posts.post_title: Graded HOFers available - Wajo Matty Young - last chance
posts.post_content:
UPDATE - I marked these down a little bit, and will leave them up for 24 more hours before sending to consignment.  So if you're interested, this is last chance before you'll have to just bid later this summer.


Need to move a few old things to make room for a couple new things.

I'll take it takes precedent over any negotiations.

Prices are delivered and net to me, or add 3% for G&S.

Can provide additional pictures if needed, just let me know.

DM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

I would consider some partial trade in certain instances, but needs to be HOF graded and/or liquid enough that I could sell for comp values, as I really do need to raise some funds.

Let's do some deals!

Wajo Portrait PSA 2 - $NLFS
Huggins & Scott just sold an SGC 2 for $3,444, this one is easily better.
It's not really stains (which is an optional qualifier now anyway), maybe it got wet at some point and bled?
Regardless, great registration as well.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/vYqJc6ql.jpg[/img][img]https://i.imgur.com/5GDtZt3l.jpg[/img]


Matty Portrait PSA 2.5 - $NLFS
Last PSA 2.5 got $2.9k in mid-March, this one is a far better example.  That "ding" on the right edge is what held this back, possibly an entire grading point?
Really nice color and registration.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/X1fojRYl.jpg[/img][img]https://i.imgur.com/5zLwITWl.jpg[/img]


Young Portrait PSA 2 - $NLFS
Last PSA 2 got $2.8k, this one has a bit better centering.  Nice deep green and great registration.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/5ukn6Yvl.jpg[/img][img]https://i.imgur.com/181COHUl.jpg[/img]


Matty Dark Cap SGC 50 - Polar Bear - $NLFS
Polar Bears graded 4 and higher are actually tougher than most people think.  Also, this is his only pose with a Polar Bear back.
There's only 8 higher in SGC, and 10 higher than a 4 in PSA.  This is a tough card that gets overlooked due to general views on Polar Bear backs. 
[img]https://i.imgur.com/M7UW3wFl.jpg[/img][img]https://i.imgur.com/gCaue49l.jpg[/img]

back to page 1

i will listen to partial trade offers on these, just needs to be similar caliber type players

i could use a cobb bat off if someone had one available
Fantastic offering. Great prices, especially on that Green Cobb. Good luck!

Green Cobb sold.

Last chance on these other guys, otherwise off to consignment later this week.
